BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

UPDATE ACTFS_CHAL_PCR_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_ACCEPTANCE=?,T.DT_CHALLAN_ACCEPTANCE_DATE=?,T.STR_CASHIER_BY=?,T.STR_CASH_RECEIPT_NO=?,T.DT_CASH_RECEIPT_DATE=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

INSERT INTO actfs_al_chal_pcr_trn (STR_DS_NO,DT_DS_DATE,STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_CHALLAN_ACCEPTANCE,DT_CHALLAN_ACCEPTANCE_DATE,STR_CASHIER_BY,STR_CASH_RECEIPT_NO,DT_CASH_RECEIPT_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,GNUM_ISVALID ,GNUM_SEAT_ID,gnum_hospital_code,NUM_CHQ_CLR_FLAG ) (select t.STR_DS_NO,t.DT_DS_DATE,t.STR_CHALLAN_NO,t.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,t.STR_CHALLAN_ACCEPTANCE,t.DT_CHALLAN_ACCEPTANCE_DATE,t.STR_CASHIER_BY,t.STR_CASH_RECEIPT_NO,t.DT_CASH_RECEIPT_DATE,t.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,t.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,t.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,t.GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,t.GNUM_ISVALID ,t.GNUM_SEAT_ID,t.gnum_hospital_code,t.NUM_CHQ_CLR_FLAG from ACTFS_CHAL_PCR_TRN t where t.STR_DS_NO=? and t.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?)
UPDATE ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?
